reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hotel is great for tourists arriving or leaving Frankfurt via the airport with a friendly and regular shuttle service to and from Airport which can also be used to take you to the Airport to access the trains into Frankfurt city which i recommend.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.text: Tip.....Hotel will allow early access to your room.,we arrived 6.30 AM after a flight from the US and were allowed into rooms immediately
reviews.title: formule 1 is better

reviews.text: Breakfast is good but a little expensive.
reviews.title: It smelt stale

likes.disliked: — attitude of the reception team, location next to a distribution centre so loads of passing lorry traffic, the stale smell

reviews.title: Breakfast included ..well maybe
reviews.text: Nice clean hotel which market is people transiting through Frankfurt Airport.
Parking is available.
reviews.title: Nice for Preflight Stays

reviews.text: Due to a delay Olympic Airlines placed our tourgroup in this hotel. The hotel is decorated in a fascinating and ultra-modern style with heavy Japanese and Scandanavian influence. The staff spoke excellent English and were friendly and professional. There was free internet in the comfortable and well-appointed lobby. I had both lunch and dinner at the hotel and the food was excellent and was presented in a very trendy fashion.
reviews.title: Splendid Airport Hotel

reviews.text: The rooms were incredibly luxurious with gigantic pillows, high quality linens, and comfortable mattresses. The room also contained a granite desk, television, and recliner. The bathroom was large and sleek, and the shower had very good water pressure.
reviews.title: Needs Updating

reviews.text: Every part of the hotel was immaculate, and I noticed the cleaning people in the lobby paying incredible attention to detail.
reviews.title: Excellent Airport Hotel
Great stay prior to flying
reviews.text: If I had one reservation it would be that I did get somewhat hot, and I cannot recall if the hotel had AC or not.

reviews.title: Ultra modern
reviews.text: Overall, it was an excellent experience and made me actually happy I had the delay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As on many trips before, we once again stayed at this very conveniently located NH hotel on the last night before our morning flight back to the US. Its shuttle bus runs like clockwork every twenty minutes and can be relied on for punctual delivery back to the airport. The hotel is a modern three story facility with well appointed rooms, all the expected amenities including fitness center and INTERNET access, but has no A/C which at summer temperatures exceeding 80 degrees causes one to keep windows open. Thus, rooms facing the street are not for light sleepers, a room facing the inner court should be requested instead. Its competent, friendly, and helpful front desk staff provides for efficient check-in and out. as its mostly business clientèle would expect. Rates are generally good value for what is offered, but at times of major events in Frankfurt can be overpriced, as is typical for the hospitality industry. The restaurant serves great food with menus changing every three months, and the wine list offers a selection for every taste.The breakfast buffet , served after 6 a.m. is extensive in its offerings. Although S-trains connect the airport with the city center in short intervals, this hotel is not in an ideal location for those doing business in the city center or visiting tourist spots, but could not be beat at what it is meant to be, an airport hotel. One can safely recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: Convenient Airport Hotel

likes.liked: — proximity of airport, predictable standard of service and performance

reviews.text: This is a very good value indeed.
reviews.title: Good bang for the buck!
good for business trip, not for fun
reviews.text: It's about 10 mins to the airport and the shuttle service always runs on time.
Rooms are modern, spacious and clean. The bathroom is pretty big with an awesome shower.
reviews.title: Enjoyed this hotel

likes.disliked: — Small shuttle and sometimes there is no room

reviews.text: There are 3 computers at the hotel lobby and internet access is available for free. Staff members are courteous and well trained. Everyone spoke english fluently.
reviews.title: Best value for Frankfurt Airport, clean and modern

likes.disliked: — Confusing with two seperate NH hotels near the Frankfurt airport

reviews.text: I stayed here two nights in late 2004. It's close to the airport, and the shuttle is free and convenient. But it's a so-so hotel, a dull but solid three star, in my opinion. My room was about what you'd expect in a fairly nice Holiday Inn off some interstate in Iowa, although the chair and bed reminded me of something bought in the 1970s by a self-styled cool, urban bachelor, i.e. a lot of chrome trim and weird fabric. (Why didn't they have a Patrick Nagel print on the wall??)
reviews.title: Not bad, but nothing terribly special

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was generous, but a very expensive price-fixe of 15 euros or so. I wasn't thrilled with that. But I must add that the mini-croissants in the lobby were absolutely heavenly.
reviews.title: A Splendid Surprise

likes.disliked: — One of the van drivers refused to lift luggage

reviews.text: All in all, an acceptable but unspectacular airport hotel.
reviews.title: A nice modern hotel with a boutique feel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at this airport hotel on our first night in Europe and on our last night a little over 2 weeks later. Modest in appearance from the outside, the inside is a handsome contemporary design with an Asian feel. The staff is friendly, the rooms are spacious, and the restaurant is really good. The hotel has frequent van service to and from the airport. My husband and I joked that we could plan our next trip to Europe with this airport hotel as our primary destination!
reviews.title: good value

reviews.text: This is a very nice hotel in close proximity to the airport. The hotel has a modern, hip feel to it and is reasonable priced. The rooms are very clean and modern as well. There was a complimentary copy of Vogue (in German) in the room and a very nice toiletry set in the bathroom that really impressed me. It looked like one that would need to be purchased, but it was complimentary.
reviews.title: Very Nice
